Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2017 11:24PM Oasis2016 wrote: Thanks ladies for all the suggestions for my growing anxiety. Had #20/25. 5 more to go! The nice therapists put on an eye bag for me. Now my breast is turning red, especially on the side, it is a little painful to touch. Have been lathering miaderm, QV cream, coconut oil with lavender essential oil, and aquaphor.
